team.title: Co-Founder, Chairman
team.name: Paul Curley
team.bioHtml: 10 years managing top flight Global International Rugby Union Players and Coaches. Manager of talent. Contracts. Sponsorship, Endorsements etc.

team.name: Céline Vandycke
team.bioHtml: Attained a Bachelors of Law  focused on French & European law from Exeter University followed by a Master of Science focused on Luxury Management & Marketing

team.title: CMO
team.name: Scott McKenna
team.bioHtml: Current CMO @Soda Former OG @Facebook

jobs.title: Senior Designer
jobs.description:
As our senior designer you will be responsible for overseeing and executing design of our UI as well as our on-going marketing collateral. You will be an integral part of both the marketing and developer team, playing a key role in our product and marketing design.

WHAT YOU NEED

An excellent sense of visual and user interface design.
Proficient in Sketch, Photoshop, Illustrator.
Proficient in designing for both Mobile and Web.
Experience with mobile-first designs.
Experience with responsive design.
Experience with using Invision.
Keeping up to date with the latest developments in UI Design/Trends.
Self starter who is comfortable working in a fast paced environment.

BENEFITS

We’re a team of entrepreneurs, we love what we do and it’s reflected in our company culture. Apart from a competitive salary and an opportunity to learn as you earn, you’ll also be part of our vibrant office culture.
You’ll get all the latest tools and equipment you need to excel in your position.
We also value time outside of the office and we believe it’s important that we have fun together, which is why we arrange weekly Friday after work beers on the house!
Free drinks and snacks!

jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description:
As our Frontend Developer, you will be an integral part of the team taking full control transforming mockup designs into front-end code. We expect curiosity, creativity and quality, and will give you the freedom to do your magic!

WHAT YOU NEED  

Proficient in coding for both Mobile and Web 
Experience with mobile-first design 
Experience with responsive design 
Creating wireframes 
Good understanding of HTML & CSS 
An understanding of Gulp/Grunt 
Javascript Experience 
Agile Experience Experience with a Javascript framework 
Bonus points if you have used Angular 4.x

BENEFITS

We’re a team of entrepreneurs, we love what we do and it’s reflected in our company culture. Apart from a competitive salary and an opportunity to learn as you earn, you’ll also be part of our vibrant office culture.

You’ll get all the latest tools and equipment you need to excel in your position.  

We also value time outside of the office and we believe it’s important that we have fun together, which is why we arrange weekly Friday after work beers on the house!

Free drinks and snacks!
